Policy Link: Sheriff said based on Pexipol model policy with specific local additions. "In short the cameras are on for all enforcement contacts ie. Traffic stops, domestic violence contacts, and generally ALL citizen contact that are or may turn into any enforcement action.  If a citizen approaches a deputy to visit or is a causal contact it is the deputies discretion and if the contact changes the camera is turned on in those cases, common sense goes a long way!"
